import React from 'react' import classes from './thumbnails.module.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import StarRating from '../StarRating/StarRating' import Price from '../Price/Price' const Thumbnails = ( {foods} ) => { return
    { foods.map( food => (
  • {food.name}
